name: PT Horizon Internusa Persada
description: Operator of a home rental platform intended to simplify the process of renting a property. The company's platform covers various types of accommodations from apartments and villas to houses and allows people to book apartments for hire or rentals, enabling property owners and developers to lease and professionally manage their vacant properties.
one_liner: Operator of a home rental platform intended to simplify the process of renting a property. The company's platform covers various types of accommodations from apartments and villas to houses and allows people to book apartments for hire or rentals, enabling property owners and developers to lease and professionally manage their vacant properties.
